text: This is the discography of Philippines recording artist Daniel Padilla, produced by Rox. Santos and managed by Star Records. He has released three studio albums, one extended play, and one compilation album. He also contributed in a total of nine guest singles and seven soundtracks. His debut album DJP won Best Selling Album of the Year in Awit Awards for two consecutive years in 2013 & 2014 with 40,00 copies sold, hence making it the highest-selling album of his career. His mini album Daniel Padilla, second studio album I Heart You; certified double platinum by PARI, while his third studio album I Feel Good certified gold.
